name: 愚者地牢-UP主的消失
description:
Introduction:
It has become a habit for an anchor to update the video without time. He is not enterprising every day and is addicted to entertainment. Suddenly one day, when he woke up, everything around him had changed, and all the sins would be liquidated at this moment.

What is the reason for all this? Who was created by this dungeon? Where did the endless blades come from?

The true image of these things is waiting for you to answer.



operating:
The game is a horizontal platform game, players can use the "↑, ↓, ←, →" button to control the character movement.
The final battle can use the "Z" key to use additional capabilities.
